FIELD.NAME: FORMAT
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Message contains a processed frame

FIELD.NAME: COLLECTION-POINT
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Receiver, device, point, path, etc. where data was received. Used to distinguish data simultaneously received at multiple collection points.

FIELD.NAME: STREAM-MODE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Identifies the mode of the stream of telemetry as either Real-time (RT), Replay (RPY), Simulator (SIM), or Test (TEST).

FIELD.NAME: FINAL-MESSAGE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: When true (and known, especially for replay data), indicates the last message in the stream.

FIELD.NAME: LENGTH
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Length of frame

FIELD.NAME: TIME
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Time of frame, usually ground receipt time

FIELD.NAME: FRAMESYNC-STATUS
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: State of frame synchronization from equipment when frame is ingested (1: Search, 2: Verify, 3: Lock, 4: Check)

FIELD.NAME: NUM-OF-FORMAT-IDENTIFIERS
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Number of fields used to identify the frames (e.g. TDM major/minor frames would have a value of 2). Zero is only permissible for vehicles with one telemetry format with a single type of frame. Value in the range of 0+.

FIELD.NAME: ARRAY-START
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Control field indicating the start of an array of object fields

FIELD.NAME: FORMAT-IDENTIFIER.n.VALUE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Value of the first field used to identify the telemetry format (e.g. value of major frame ID for TDM telemetry). If the message is used with XTCE, this is the first restriction criteria in an XTCE container.

FIELD.NAME: ARRAY-END
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Control field indicating the end of an array of object fields

FIELD.NAME: NUM-OF-MNEMONICS
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Total number of mnemonics in this message. Value in the range of 1+.

FIELD.NAME: ARRAY-START
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Control field indicating the start of an array of object fields

FIELD.NAME: MNEMONIC.n.NAME
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: NAME of the first mnemonic

FIELD.NAME: MNEMONIC.n.STATUS
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Status of the first mnemonic: valid mnemonic, or valid mnemonic with no data, or invalid mnemonic (1: Valid, 2: Valid, No data, 3: Invalid)

FIELD.NAME: MNEMONIC.n.UNITS
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Units associated with the value converted to engineering units for the first mnemonic

FIELD.NAME: MNEMONIC.n.NUM-OF-SAMPLES
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Number of data samples for the first mnemonic. This value should equal the number of times the mnemonic appears in the telemetry frame (e.g. will be greater than 1 for super-commutated telemetry points.

FIELD.NAME: ARRAY-START
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Control field indicating the start of an array of object fields

FIELD.NAME: MNEMONIC.n.SAMPLE.m.TIME-STAMP
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Time stamp for the first data sample of the first mnemonic

FIELD.NAME: MNEMONIC.n.SAMPLE.m.RAW-VALUE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Raw value for the first data sample of the first mnemonic

FIELD.NAME: MNEMONIC.n.SAMPLE.m.EU-VALUE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Raw value converted to Engineering Units if engineering units conversion is present for the first data sample of the first mnemonic

FIELD.NAME: MNEMONIC.n.SAMPLE.m.TEXT-VALUE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Raw value converted to a text string if text conversion is present for the first data sample of the first mnemonic

FIELD.NAME: MNEMONIC.n.SAMPLE.m.LIMIT-ENABLE-DISABLE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Indicates the limit checking state for the first data sample of the first mnemonic

FIELD.NAME: ARRAY-END
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Control field indicating the end of an array of object fields

FIELD.NAME: ARRAY-END
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Control field indicating the end of an array of object fields
